text: Eiterfeld is a village in Germany in the east of Hesse. It can be found north of the town of Fulda and south of the town of Bad Hersfeld. ==Tourism== The most important building is Burg Fürsteneck, a castle from the Middle Ages. It is preserved and restored competely. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * Akademie Burg Fürsteneck Category:Villages in Hesse Category:Fulda (district)
title: Eiterfeld
